attributes.action: hold to account those MPs who have claimed expenses with questionable morales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs who have claimed extortionate amounts of money by "fiddling" their expense must be punished serveley, even if conducted within the "rules" in cases where they acted immorally.
The expenses fiasco has shown these people to be untrustworthy at best and fraudulent at worst.
What I find outraging is the lack of remorse of some of the MPs in question.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
